Package.Name: Bloggers
Package.InternalNotes:
These are from the base game. Copy from their folder in audioww to the root audioww to update

Packages are
\World_of_Tanks_NAes\packages\audioww-part1.pkg
\World_of_Tanks_NAes\packages\audioww-part2.pkg

Files to copy are the same as in the zips.

(voices from contributor event 2020-01)

*Made by WG.

Package.Name: Company of Heroes [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: 2020-10-28: From Ekspoint there are no mods more\r\n\r\nRemoved Ekspoint_load.wotmod & LobbyApi.wotmod
Package.Author: Andre_V
Package.Description:
Siegfried by Strategic_Music+Andre_V_german
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
Crew Sound Steel Foxes by Strategic Music and Andre_V
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Sergey Eybog - Technical director - Sergey Eybog
Erich Muff, Manuel Haefele - german Voice
Andrew Burmistrov, Savva Dudin, Stan Polesko, Ekaterina Kuzmenko - Sound editors
Olga Nigmatulina - Artist

Package.Name: Steel Foxes with Strategic Music [by {author}]
Package.Author: AndreV
Package.Description:
Steel Foxes with Strategic Music & Andre_V
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Will Bucknum – script writing, voice direction
Aaron Baca – script writing
Technical director – Serge Eybog
Sound design – Andrew Burmistrov, Stas Polesko, Petr Yakyamsev
Douglas Pullar – commander
John Bell – additional voice-over

2019-01-05_v6:
Added:
Bvat_02 [vo_vehile_destroyed/male]
Bvat_03 [vo_vehile_destroyed/male]
Cooper_008 [vo_armor_not_pierced_by_player/male]
Cooper_007 [vo_dp_player_joined_platoon, vo_dp_player_joined]

Scotty_27 [Not relevent to WOT]
Holo_Leeta_Dabo3 from vo_enemy_hp_damaged_by_explosion_at_direct_hit_by_player/male [Its only supposed to be played when a female crew is used] 
Removed extra sound files

Modified:
Reduced Q Death sound [Too loud]
Added some Spock sounds to events properly [wherent playing]

Package.Author: Ed76na
Package.Description:
With Sound Event Injector; 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches for the Events are needed 

No PYmods_BanksLoader - only Patches to engine_config.xml

Usable with WWIIHWA (no Bankloader - Patches used)
- Sound Event Injector is compatible with WWIIHWA

Package.UpdateComment:
V. 2.18 Added FV/T95 custom sounds
Fixed german HL234 engine

V. 2.16 Fixed scripts for xmas style
Fixed Panther turbo engine sound
Fixed missing french engine sounds

V.2.15: Added engine sounds for some american tanks
V.2.14: Added support for Super Hellcat

V. 2.10 Patchnote Compatibility with 1.6.0.2
Fixed leopard engine sound
Fixed T-116 gun sound
Added 64bit memory profile

Package.Name: NOTES: Engines by Ed76na & Apa6ecka
Package.InternalNotes:
Dont use PYmods_BanksLoader with WWIIHWA: 
- Sound Event Injector is incompatible with WWIIHWA
- "WoT-Circle": Restart -> Crash -> Restart -> Crash....)
Sound Event Injector : 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches are needed 
- updating get much easier & faster

0. Soundinjektor is a great tool for modding sounds - no Patches are needed - updating gets much easier
1. Problem: Working alone as intended check replays
2. Problem: Soundinjektor is incompatible with WWIIHWA (WOT-Circle -- restart->crash->restart->crash....)
3. Dont have Ideas/ muse / moods for fixing now -123gauss

Reworking packeges: WE should saves this extra 
http://bigmods.relhaxmodpack.com/WoT/Medias/Pictures/garage_graphics/LoadingLogo/Garage_Graphics_loading_logo_Relhax_with small_BG_by_Warranted.png
Package.Description:
With Sound Event Injector; 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches for the Events are needed 

No PYmods_BanksLoader - only Patches to engine_config.xml

Usable with WWIIHWA (no Bankloader - Patches used)
- Sound Event Injector is compatible with WWIIHWA


Willster: 
I dont know what we do with tthe Sound Event Injector Versions (script-file)
Bank-loader isnt used here & In Relhax - not necessary 
- take audio.xml/engine.config.xml

 (no original files by WG as template)
Package.UpdateComment: Fedor Saveliev retired) too much work for this tricky mod,to rework\r\nAGQJ: http://forum.worldoftanks.ru/index.php?/topic/1778752-

Package.Author: GnomeFather / Zorgane
Package.Description:
This mod alters the sounds via the tanks xml's. This makes the mod break every patch. Expect some time for updates. Use Wrath of the Gods gun sounds, or Shimada if you want something that doesnt break every patch.

Dont forget : I (Zorgane) need reviews ! - use devolper website to do this please
Package.UpdateComment:
V. 2.18 Added FV/T95 custom sounds
Fixed german HL234 engine

V. 2.16 Fixed scripts for xmas style
Fixed Panther turbo engine sound
Fixed missing french engine sounds

V.2.15: Added engine sounds for some american tanks
V.2.14: Added support for Super Hellcat

V. 2.10 Patchnote Compatibility with 1.6.0.2
Fixed leopard engine sound
Fixed T-116 gun sound
Added 64bit memory profile

Package.Name: Kill (UT Announcer)
Package.Description: UT Countdown:\nPlays certain sounds for when you get a certain number of kills in the game.

Package.Name: Locastan original config
Package.Description:
Locastan´s full UT config:

- textmessages ( firsttext / kamikazetext / ramkilltext / biatext / crucialtext / paybacktext / paybackowntext / deniedtext )

- battletimer

- ut announcements for killcount ( firstblood / doublekill / triplekill / ultrakill / multikill / monsterkill / killingspree / rampage / unstoppable / godlike / megakill / topgun / massacre / flakmaster / unreal)

- first kill announcement for any player

- extrasounds ( kamikaze / eradication / extermination / ramkill / payback / denied )

Package.Name: Webium config
Package.Description:
Webiium´s UT config:

- no textmessages

- battletimer

- ut announcements for killcount ( one / two / three / four / five / six / seven / eight / nine / ten / eleven / twelve / thirteen / fourteen / fifteen )

- first kill announcement for USER only

- extrasounds ( kamikaze / eradication / extermination / ramkill / payback / denied )

Package.Name: Ammo Explosions v{version} [by {author}]
Package.Author: The Illusion
Package.Description:
This will make ammo explosions sound much better.

Includes:
Ammo detonation (Both you, and other players)
Ammo cook offs (Those big nasty ones you sometimes get, with the jets).

This mod is inspired by The Mighty Jingles.

Package.Author: Andre_V / jakis_nick
Package.Description:
EMMC:Epic Mega Music Collection by jakis_nick 
+ made with new project 1.2 from WG: There is a music on every map
+ contains 559 (2019-12-10) tracks of trailer music, such bands as:
-Audiomachine, 
-Battle X Music, 
-Colossal Trailer Music, 
-Epic North, 
-Ninja Tracks.

The tracks were sorted so that they would not be repeated in different events.

 (original files by WG as template =>No Patches needed)

New WWISE version/liscence ===> New Soundbanks
Package.Author: YoRHa_NO_9_Type_S
Package.Description:
Hiroyuki Sawano is a Japanese composer and musician best known for his work on many anime, TV series, and movies.

In this mod you will be able to enjoy his epic soundtracks while playing tanks !
Soundtracks are chosen from famous animes such as Attack On Titan, Re:Creators, Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn, Aldnoah.Zero, etc.

Music in following places will be replaced:
Hanger, Battle, Loading screen, Win/Lose/Draw screen

============================================================

Sawano’s work has been made into wot mod since 2013 and I had a lot of good experiences while using it, but I’m so sad that the original mod maker is no longer active. So I decide to make this mod and bring those experiences back to players!

============================================================

https://dieschwarzenschafe.com/download/index.php?action=list&dir=WWIIHWA&order=name&srt=yes
installed from relhax text file is used for the mod so our patched sound settings are not over-ridden on game startup

patch: 
_patch\WWIIHWA_Ambiente_6.Sinn_XVM-Out_Patch.xml

res_mods\versiondir\scripts\client\gui\mods:
	__init__.pyc, mod_WWIIHWA.pyc

res_mods\versiondir\scripts\client\gui\mods\WWIIHWA: 
installed_from_relhax.txt, sixthsense.png, WWIIHWA.xml, WWIIHWA CustomMusic.xml

dont remove: 
res_mods\versiondir\scripts\client\gui\mods\WWIIHWA\installed_from_relhax.txt
backup: 
_readme\installed_from_relhax.txt
_readme\WWIIHWA_Ambiente_Base_(historical_music_ambient_gui)_addALL_patch.xml

Package.Author: Budyx69
Package.Description:
WWIIHWA Ambiente by Budyx69
Use WWIIHWA-Configuration.exe for settings, located in your WOT directory

Hangar Sounds: Hangar Ambiente between Standard and Premium, 
Battle Ambiente: Sounds in Battleground, 
Different Sounds and Crew Voices for: 
Gun reloaded, enemy sighted, 6. Sense, Battletimer Countdown in minutes, Cap Sirens (Own capping/ enemy capping) etc.
